thread.title: Anna Kendrick Just Revealed Who's Returning For Pitch Perfect 3
thread.title_full: Anna Kendrick Just Revealed Who's Returning For Pitch Perfect 3

author: Michael Hafford
title: Anna Kendrick Just Revealed Who's Returning For Pitch Perfect 3
text: Kendrick Pitch Perfect 3 Cast Reveal Anna Kendrick Just Revealed Who's Returning For Pitch Perfect 3 January 6, 2017 , 2:00 AM Pitch Perfect is perhaps our least likely movie franchise. At first blush, a comedy about an a cappella singing group seems like a rejected Whit Stillman idea. Even star Anna Kendrick wasn't sure people would watch the original .But it's returning for its third installment soon, and we're getting a whole raft of favorites back in the fold. Given that we follow Pitch Perfect rumors like children trying to escape a witch, this is a sizable breadcrumb.Kendrick dropped a pitch perfect Instagram chock full of Barden Bellas. Those Bellas include Kendrick herself, Rebel Wilson, Anna Camp, Alexis Knapp, Hana Mae Lee, Chrissie Fit, and Ester Dean. That's a lot of star power. A photo posted by Anna Kendrick (@annakendrick47) on Jan 5, 2017 at 4:43pm PST Advertisement We'll miss the departing Treblemakers , but this is a damn good start. Advertisement
